text: Hana roe mate sidroe-droe ureueng í Meu kon ka izin sideh bak Allah d Ajai geutanyoe cit ka geutuleh Bandum ka meuceh watee geukeubah Teuma soe nyang hʻeut keu pahla donya Kamoe jok teuma keu jih nyan bagah Nyang meuhʻeut galak pahla akhirat Kamoe bri ligat hana meuilah Ureueng nyang chuko hana jikaphe ‘Oh uroe akhe cit Kamoe balah
